function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Open office layouts are vulnerable to disease transmission, as evidenced by cases of COVID-19 transmission in Zurich and India.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection among employees.","Mitigation":"Alter open plan layouts to make them more disease resilient and promote personal spaces.","Technologies":"Use of physical barriers, touch-free technologies, and IoT networks to reduce contact with virus-laden surfaces.","People":"Employees, office workers","Owner":"Designers, architects, office management"},{"Description":"Virus-laden surfaces in the office, such as elevator keys, doorknobs, keyboards, and electrical switches, are prominent modes of disease transfer.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection among employees.","Mitigation":"Implement touch-free technologies and IoT networks to minimize physical contact with high-touch surfaces.","Technologies":"Use of network-connected devices, touch-free technologies, IoT networks.","People":"Employees, office workers","Owner":"Office management, IT department"}]}
